ingredients.ingredient: 4 large clove fresh garlic, peeled and sliced
½ teaspoon kosher salt, or other course-grain salt
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or more to taste
½ cup light, extra-virgin olive oil
1 teaspoon water to adjust texture, or more as needed

cookingTips: Crush garlic with salt first to break it down and release its oils
Add oil very slowly at first while whisking to create an emulsion
If the aioli breaks, start with a fresh garlic clove and whisk in the broken mixture gradually
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Traditional aioli is just garlic, salt, and oil. How do I emulsify it properly without it breaking?
